name: Lazyfeed
overview: Lazyfeed is a realtime RSS feeder that indexes tags on the internet to help users follow topics of interest across online information sources, instead of subscribing to specific blogs. The company’s other product is Lazyscope, a Twitter and RSS reader combined into one.
